page.title: 03Pembrey Gazetteer (3)
page.content: Bordered on the south by the London/Fishguard railway and to the north by the A484 Carmarthen/Llanelli road, the village is within the parliamentary constituency of Llanelli, and has a County Councillor representative at Carmarthen, but is administratively controlled by Llanelli Borough Council. Minor local affairs are the responsibility of Pembrey Community Council. {Ashburnham Golf Club } Ashburnham Golf Club was established in 1892. It is an 18 hole, link course. In 1978 The Martini Golf Tournament was held there. This year, 1985, the Welsh Amateur Tournament will be played there. {Ashburnham Hotel} The Ashburnham Hotel was built in 1823. It is the only hotel in Pembrey.
